about.title: Mission-driven full stack developer with a passion for thoughtful UI design, collaboration, and teaching.
about.paragraph1: From 2014 to 2021, I had a first life in accounting during which I put my financial expertise at the service of my merchant and artisan clients. I really liked meeting their legal needs, but I quickly saw the limits of technical accounting evolution. Surrounded by developers, I was naturally interested in computer technology.
about.paragraph2: In 2021, I decided to put an end to my accounting career to train myself in software development. I started by cramming on theoretical sites and very quickly I started creating sites. In this process I was accompanied by my father, and my two brothers, all three passionate and experts in development / architecture.
about.paragraph3: Thanks to the sites that I implemented and on which I had a lot of fun, I practiced several languages. The ones that I particularly liked and for which I deepened my knowledge are JavaScript, Typescript and C#.
education.engineer-speciality: Computer science of the internet and communicating objects
education.prepa-location: School of La Favorite Sainte Thérèse
